existing_features.title: Update the Profile Customization UI flow so users can upload, preview, remove, and save a profile picture, and the saved value reloads correctly from getCallerUserProfile().

new_feature_requests.summary: Add profile picture/avatar support for user profiles

Persist each authenticated user’s profile picture selection in the backend user profile record (stored per caller Principal) so it is returned by getCallerUserProfile() after being saved via setProfileCustomization().
Show the current user’s profile picture (or initials fallback) in the main authenticated app header wherever the signed-in user identity is displayed.

projectName: Add profile picture support for user profiles
